scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run server1" "npm run server2" "npm run server3"
scripts.start:windows: start cmd /k "npm run server1" && timeout 2 && start cmd /k "npm run server2" && timeout 2 && start cmd /k "npm run server3"
scripts.start:all-powershell: powershell -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd', '$PWD', ';', 'npm', 'run', 'server1' ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd', '$PWD', ';', 'npm', 'run', 'server2' ; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd', '$PWD', ';', 'npm', 'run', 'server3'"
